title: Facebook starting to fix iPhone battery drain issues with latest app update, explains why its happening
text:
Facebook starting to fix iPhone battery drain issues with latest app update, explains why its happening 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
Facebook has taken to, shocker, Facebook to explain some of the issues causing significant iPhone battery drain when using its app. The app ...
